title: BimlFlex Synapse forward-only approach for deployment
description: A forward-only deployment approach (migration plan) is recommended to work with Synapse, and it is how BimlFlex updates the generated data solution artifacts on the target Synapse platform.

frontMatter.title: BimlFlex Synapse forward-only approach for deployment
frontMatter.summary: Background on supporting a forward-only approach for Synapse deployment
